headline: North America Power Quality Equipment Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Hitachi, Siemens, EATON, Emerson Electric, Schneider Electric, GE, Toshiba, Schaffner
summary: The North America Power Quality Equipment Market is projected to grow significantly from $7.77 billion in 2024 to $12.11 billion by 2033, at a robust CAGR of 5.05%. High demand for efficient power solutions and technological advancements are key growth drivers. Power quality equipment ensures electrical stability crucial for industries reliant on uninterrupted supply, such as telecommunication and data centers.
